title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 303 - Prohibitions Against Discrimination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 303 - Prohibitions Against Discrimination

State Regulations
§ 303.1 - Social services district policy
§ 303.2 - Utilization of other organizations
§ 303.3 - Participants in community work and training programs
§ 303.4 - Volunteers and other nonemployees of social services districts
§ 303.5 - Compliance with the Civil Rights Act of 1964 (as amended in 1972) and the Rehabilitation Act of 1973
§ 303.6 - Protection of recipients from unlawful discrimination
§ 303.7 - Persons with AIDS or infected with HIV
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 303

Statutory authority: N.Y. Const., art. XVII, § 2; Social

Services Law, §§17, 20, 34; L. 1971, ch. 110, §
83

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
